meta.title: Operation of Multiple Organ Bath Assembly

sections.purpose: To simultaneously study multiple isolated tissues under identical or varying conditions.
procedure: Fill each bath with physiological solution and maintain at controlled temperature.
Mount tissues in each bath with corresponding transducers.
Apply resting tension and allow equilibration with periodic washing.
Administer drugs according to experimental design in selected baths.
At the end, discard tissues and clean all baths and tubing.
precautions: Check uniformity of temperature and aeration across baths.
Inspect electrical connections and heaters regularly.
